text: Shiraz Solar Power Plant is a concentrating solar power type pilot power station situated near Shiraz, Iran. It became operational in 2008. The plant uses concentrating parabolic mirrors to focus a beam of light on a tower making steam for electricity generating turbines. It has a capacity of 250 kilowatt (kW). It is a project aimed at developing technologies needed for larger solar power plants, and is currently being upgraded to 500 kW capacity. ==See also== *Solar power in Iran *Yazd solar power station *List of power stations in Iran *International rankings of Iran ==References== ==External links== *Renewable energy organization of Iran Category:Solar power stations in Iran Category:Buildings and structures in Fars Province
